summary: Tested visual editor features, subscription system, and export functionality. Backend APIs mostly working but frontend authentication issues prevent comprehensive testing of visual editor toolbar and pricing page features.

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 520 error when creating new articles
critical_bugs.impact: Prevents testing of HTML/PDF export features

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 520 error instead of proper tpay configuration error
critical_bugs.impact: Checkout flow broken, should return 503 with clear message

ui_bugs.issue: Login process fails with timeout after clicking submit button
Cannot access dashboard after login - authentication not persisting

integration_issues.issue: Frontend login form not properly integrating with backend auth API

passed_tests: Subscription plans API returns correct data (monthly: 59.99 PLN, semiannual: 7% discount, annual: 15% discount)
Login form elements present and functional
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix frontend login authentication flow - users cannot log in to test visual editor features. Backend has some 520 errors on POST endpoints that need investigation. Once login is fixed, need to verify visual editor toolbar, pricing page components, and export functionality.
